CustomField.formula:
IF (ContactId <> "",
HYPERLINK("https://asap2.convoq.com/meeting/sfmeetnow.aspx?lid=" & ContactId, IMAGE("https://asap2.convoq.com/Images/Presence/Init.gif?lid=" & ContactId, "Install ASAP to initiate online meetings.", 16, 15) & "Meet with Contact"),
"Contact not specified")
CustomField.label: Meet with Contact
